title: Account transfer still down.
body:
Why account transfer is still down?
It should be up 20 nov. shouldn't it?

replies.body: Those transfers were scheduled to be back on Nov 20, but it looks like there were some unexpected issues that prevented them from coming back online. I haven't heard much about when they'll be back, but HollyMonster has been commenting about what's going on [**over on this post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/xWLAkZKW-account-transfers-going-on-cooldown?comment=006e).
